meanings.def: the general arrangement, plan, design, etc. of something
examples: The format of the new quiz show has proved popular.
For this year, we have decided to change the format of the conference slightly.
The course is different in format from previous ones.
Try to experiment with different designs and formats.
We will follow the same format as last year.

meanings.def: the shape and size of a book, magazine, etc.
examples: They've brought out the magazine in a new format.
The book is now available in a slightly smaller format.

meanings.def: the way in which data is stored or held to be worked on by a computer
examples: The images are stored in a digital format within the database.
The drive supports the following DVD formats.

meanings.def: to arrange text in a particular way on a page or a screen
to prepare a computer disk for storing digital information
